title: Looking For Team ADC Main - Plat 5
body:
Hello my IGN is : Raf. I am a Plat 5 ADC main. I live in nz and can play 8 - 9pm in the weekdays and 2 - 10 pm in the weekends. I am looking for a semi-serious team  that is comitted. Thanks
EDIT: I am prepared to play other roles if the team is commited
